channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Morgan Wallen and Post Malone headline a very collaborative Country Music Association Awards
item.description: Post Malone and Morgan Wallen’s collaboration “I Had Some Help” could make both men big winners at the Country Music Association Awards.

item.title: Susan Smith to ask parole board for her freedom after serving 30 years for drowning her children
item.description: Susan Smith will ask a parole board in South Carolina for her freedom for the first time on Wednesday.

item.title: Stock market today: Global stocks mixed as worries over Russia-Ukraine war loom
item.description: World stocks are mixed despite gains on Wall Street, as worries mount over escalations in the Russia-Ukraine war.
